name: Rock 'n' Roll Will Never Die! DEMO
name_original: Rock 'n' Roll Will Never Die! DEMO
description:
Glam rock's not dead, it just smells funny! Get your denim vest, bandana and makeup, and dive into a point-and-click adventure as a middle-aged teddy bear planning a comeback with his old glam rock band – in a world where glam rock has been dead and buried for decades.

*** This is a short demo version of the game. ***

*** Full game available later in 2021. ***

Experience all the fun of organizing band activities with people who have families and careers, rehearsing in moldy basements, trying to convince promoters to book your band, and playing Tuesday night support gigs at empty bars for no money! The full game will offer hours of adventuring with 100+ characters and exciting locations in glorious hand-drawn 1920 x 1080 pixel graphics. This demo only gives you a small taste of all that, but that's how demos are. That's rock 'n' roll!
